ModMetaData.name: Customizable Grand Sculptures
ModMetaData.author: Squirting Elephant
ModMetaData.description:
Allows you to customize the important stats of Grand Sculptures.
Technical info: - Uses C# but is very compatible. Source is included. - Can safely be added and removed to an existing game without any problems. - Changes require a game restart (save and exit, start Rimworld and load game).
